channel.title: Archivers on Datto's Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Archivers on Datto's Archive

item.title: Introducing UrGift App
item.description:
The new way to express your feelings to the one you love.

Confessing love with technology is a new and modern way compared to traditional methods. UrGift is a fun app that helps you express your feelings in a unique and exciting way. Based on the original confession website for Desktop, UrGift Android has a simple and optimized design. Some features from the Desktop version have been removed, but new and interesting ones have been added to make your confession even better.

item.title: Setup and Fix Windows Tool
item.description:
A streamlined command-line utility for quick access to Windows settings and troubleshooting common issues. Key features include:

  1. System Configuration: Access Computer Management, System Properties, and Programs.

  2. Network & Devices: Manage Network, Sharing, and Print options.

  3. Customization: Modify Personalization and Power settings.

  4. Troubleshooting Tools: Fix Windows Updates, Wi-Fi issues, and view activation status.

  5. Utilities: Date/Time settings, Region, System Info, Activate Windows and more.

Designed for IT support, this tool is user-friendly and organized for fast system management. Ensure to run as Administrator for optimal functionality.

item.title: Catch Me If You Can
item.description:
This is an official version of my first awesome game. Simply follow the in-game instructions and hopefully, you’ll enjoy it.

Try it directly here or you can downloads it:

  • Catch Me If You Can: 99 MB (November 13, 2021)
  • Catch Me If You Can - Beta: 97 MB (August 9, 2021)

item.title: Lemon App
item.description:
This project was retired on December 31st 2020.

Dear player, we have discontinued support for the Lemon App after December 31, 2020, in order to focus on creating a more exciting product that brings greater benefits to users. We sincerely thank you for trusting and using our product.

Info

There is no information for this App.

Android 4.0+ or higher required

Download responsibly!

Download

item.title: Restore Wifi (Fix Wifi)
item.description:
This project was retired on December 15th 2020.

Hello, we may have some unfortunate news for you. The Restore Wifi (Fix Wifi) tools will officially be discontinued on December 15, 2020.

After this date, there will be no new updates or patches available for this tools. Therefore, you have to uninstall the tool because hackers may attack and steal your data.

Frequently Asked Questions

Question: Will the tool still work if it is retired?
Answer: The tool would still work if it were retired.
